column1: The party is officially underway. Jews, Christians and Muslims have united, ushering ten years of Van Halen.  Out in the crowd, people are celebrating like never before.  No doubt Israel is the happiest, rockingest place to be.

What can this reporter say except that Israel freaking rocks! Things just keep getting better here, Tom. And in a few days, they'll be honoring the little boy who discovered the red cow, here on stage, and things are gonna go off!
